title: Is kayaking allowed on Sutton Lake? If so, is there a good place from which to launch?
text:
Yes. In fact,it's a popular fishing spot for kayak anglers, and
there's a boat ramp there. 



Here are a couple of links with some more information.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4831





http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090228/COLUMNISTS/903081996
